name: Voicevoice, Inc.
description: Developer of a platform designed to help people participate in virtual events featuring real conversations. The company's platform offers social conferencing where people can convene around a topic or cause, engage in small group conversation to learn, share, inspire one another to action and change and connect live voices that can build relationships, develop minds, open hearts, and change the world, enabling people to be a part of meaningful, large-scale conversations that can bring about changes.
one_liner: Developer of a platform designed to help people participate in virtual events featuring real conversations. The company's platform offers social conferencing where people can convene around a topic or cause, engage in small group conversation to learn, share, inspire one another to action and change and connect live voices that can build relationships, develop minds, open hearts, and change the world, enabling people to be a part of meaningful, large-scale conversations that can bring about changes.
